scripts.build: echo "Initial CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Current Node.js version:" && node --version && echo "Ensuring pnpm@10.11.0 is used via npx..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --version && echo "Ensuring CWD is MONOREPO ROOT (/workspace)..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && echo "CWD for pnpm install: $(pwd)" && echo "Running pnpm install from MONOREPO ROOT..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 install --frozen-lockfile && echo "CWD for nx build: $(pwd)" && echo "Running nx build from MONOREPO ROOT using direct node call..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store node ./node_modules/nx/bin/nx.js build test-app --configuration=production && echo "Build script finished."
scripts.start: echo "Initial CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Current Node.js version:" && node --version && echo "Ensuring pnpm@10.11.0 is used for start script via npx..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --version && echo "Ensuring CWD is MONOREPO ROOT (/workspace) for start..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store node ./node_modules/.bin/serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
